catalog_info.title: Algorithms for Big Data
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Mathematical maturity and comfort with algorithms (e.g. CS 124), discrete probability, and linear algebra.
catalog_info.description: This course will cover rigorous methods, based on solid theoretical foundations, for processing massive amounts of data. Topics discussed will include streaming and sketching algorithms, dimensionality reduction, and external memory algorithms, to name a few.
